Not ideal but it works...

comments.text:
(In reply to comment #3)
> fwiw, Mike Easter on the m.s.thunderbird NG pointed out that Subject will sort
> ascending if one first changes the Date sort order to ascending.
> Not ideal but it works...

More on this workaround.
If one sorts by subject without first sorting by date, the sort for that subject is hosed until another topic is selected and sorted Date>Subject.
Then we can go back to the original subject post, sort by date, then subject.
